topology: 所有的路由器都运行OSPFv3，整个自治系统划分为3个区域。其中DeviceB和DeviceC作为ABR（区域边界路由器）来转发区域之间的路由。DeviceA、DeviceB、DeviceC、DeviceD 均运行OSPFv3。
requirement: 配置完成后，每台路由器都应学到AS内的所有网段的路由。整个自治系统划分为3个区域：Area 0（骨干区域）、Area 1和Area 2。
steps: 在各路由器上使能OSPFv3的基本功能。
指定不同区域内的网段。

configs.DeviceA:
#
sysname DeviceA
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::2/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.1
#
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:4::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.1
#
ospfv3 1
 router-id 1.1.1.1
 area 0.0.0.1
#
return
configs.DeviceB:
#
sysname DeviceB
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:1::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.1
#
ospfv3 1
 router-id 2.2.2.2
 area 0.0.0.0
 area 0.0.0.1
#
return
configs.DeviceC:
#
sysname DeviceC
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown

 ipv6 address 2001:db8:1::2/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:3::1/64
 ospfv3 1 area 0.0.0.2
#
ospfv3 1
 router-id 3.3.3.3
 area 0.0.0.0
 area 0.0.0.2
#
return
configs.DeviceD:
#
sysname DeviceD
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable

#
ospfv3 1

#
return
